akn:subsection.akn:heading: Demonstration programs for the purpose of commercialization

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Demonstration programs for the purpose of commercialization
(d) Authorization of appropriations There are authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary to carry out this section—

(e) Coordination The Secretary shall coordinate the activities authorized in this section with the activities authorized in section 16298 of this title as part of one consolidated program at the Department. Nothing in section 16298 of this title shall be construed as limiting the authorities provided in this section.
